title: Hello=Fire
text:
Hello=Fire is the debut album of <a href="Dean%20Fertita">Dean Fertita</a>'s solo project with the same name. The album was recorded at various studios while Fertita was on tour with <a href="Queens%20of%20the%20Stone%20Age">Queens of the Stone Age</a>. The album features guest appearances by band members from Queens of the Stone Age, <a href="Brendan%20Benson">Brendan Benson</a> who also produced the album as well as <a href="The%20Afghan%20Whigs">The Afghan Whigs</a> drummer Michael Horrigan. The album was released October 26, 2009 by <a href="Schnitzel%20Records%20Ltd.">Schnitzel Records Ltd.</a>. "Nature Of Our Minds" was released as its first single.
Track listing.
All tracks written by Dean Fertita except where noted.
Personnel.
Mixed by Dave Feeny, Tempermill Studio
Recorded by:
Performed by:
Design - Tal Brosh
